meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lifelike.
meanings.sent1: The lifelikenesses of the robot amazed the audience at the science fair.
meanings.sent2: The lifelikenesses of the painting made it difficult to distinguish from a photograph.
meanings.sent3: The lifelikenesses of the mannequin in the store window startled a passing pigeon.
meanings.sent4: Her lifelikenesses on stage were so convincing that the audience felt like they were watching a real person.
meanings.sent5: The lifelikenesses of the wax figure were so striking that visitors mistook it for a celebrity.

meanings.definition: Resemblance to real life in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The artist's lifelikenesses sculptures were admired for their realistic details.
meanings.sent2: The lifelikenesses portrait captured every feature of the subject's face perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The lifelikenesses cat costume made everyone at the party do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: Her lifelikenesses performance on stage brought the character to life in a whole new way.
meanings.sent5: The lifelikenesses movements of the robot were so precise that it seemed almost human.
